Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People on social media have been expressing their concerns over the high cost of living and low wages. The discussion is centered around the need to raise the rate to combat the inflation rate of 7% and provide affordable rentals for people on low incomes. The social media users have also criticized the government and asked for significant policy changes in the budget. Some former RBA governors have also joined the conversation to add their voices to calls to #raisetherate. People are emphasizing the need for governments worldwide to use their power for the people.
